text.name: longdescription
text.text: Built by Acorn Computers in the 1980s for the BBC Computer Literacy Project. CPU MOS Technology 6502A @ 2MHz, 32KB RAM + 16KB OS ROM + 16KB BASIC ROM, Graphics Motorola 6845 and Mullard SAA5050 (up to 640 x 256 (PAL) or 640 x 200 (NTSC)), Sound Texas Instruments SN76489. Release date Dec '81.
